title: Two bedroom house in Port Richmond with central air!
description:
Two bed/1 1/2 bath home for rent in port Richmond. Enter through the front porch into a large living room space with a coat closet and half bath on the first floor. Continue through to a second room which could be used as a dining space which opens up to the kitchen. Kitchen has gas stove and fridge. There is a large fenced in back patio that has ivy and morning glories growing up the fencing for shade and privacy. Three large planters located in the yard for adding your own greenery.
Two bedrooms and a full bath are located on the second floor. Front room has a very large closet and bay window which gets plenty of light. Back room is carpeted and has a closet for storage.
There is also use of a full basement for storage. Basement also includes washer and dryer. House has central air and gas heat. Tenant will be responsible for all utilities except water.
Pet friendly home and lease is month to month. Available for showings and flexible move in date. Background check and two references are required.
Located within walking distance to several great restaurants and bars as well as several shopping areas for all your weekly errands! Walk easily to Richmond ave where you’ll find great local businesses such as Lunar Inn, Reanimator coffee, launderette records with many new businesses opening in the near future. Walk down Frankford ave to Martha, Philadelphia brewing company, pizza brain, hello donuts and many other great locally owned small businesses.

title: Available Early January, Move in for the New Year!
description:
Available early January, move in for the New Year! Showcasing waterfront and city views from the exclusive vantage of a spacious unit in the Society Hill Towers (designed by IM Pei), this stunning two bedroom condo was designed to impress. Featuring floor to ceiling windows with custom treatments, vinyl plank wood flooring, an open concept living area, modern fixtures, and coveted building amenities including a 24 hour concierge, maintenance, as well as underground Parking, health club, and seasonal pool available for an additional monthly fee, this residence has it all. The second bedroom also includes ample closet space, river views, and tons of opportunity for a home office, guest suite, and more. Tiled hall bath just off the hall and across from both of the two bedrooms. The conveniences continue with a small supermarket on site with delivery service, as well as a dry cleaners and the well regarded Zahav Restaurant. title: STUNNING, COMPLETELY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATHROOM RESIDENCE!
description:
Stunning, completely renovated two bedroom, two bathroom residence located on the 19th floor of The Academy House along the Avenue of the Arts! Enter into the foyer with black tile floors and coat closet. The large eat-in kitchen has granite countertops, a peninsula, breakfast nook, modern wood cabinets, subway tile back splash and stainless steel appliances including a Frigidaire electric range, oven and microwave, a Kitchenaid refrigerator, and a Whirlpool dishwasher. The adjacent great room has hardwood floors and city views to the south and east from a private Juliet balcony which can be accessed from each room. The primary suite has great closet space and a spacious ensuite bathroom which features a shower/tub with subway tile and a double vanity. The second bedroom is spacious and also has a large amount of closet space. Directly across is the hall bathroom which has tile flooring, a contemporary glass vanity, and a shower/tub. There is a Maytag stackable washer/dryer in the unit. No detail was left undone in this showplace condominium. The terrace doors were pushed out to increase interior square footage. Residents of Academy House enjoy a 24-hour doorman and a state-of-the-art fitness and aquatic center. Easy access to the Market Frankford Line, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge make this a commuter's dream and on the evenings and weekends you are in the heart of everything that Old City has to offer including tons of boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants and museums. description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
Apartment Home Features:
* Wood floors
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 10th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* Renovated kitchen and bathroom
* Large north-facing windows with city skyline view
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included

The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, and L'Occitane en Provence. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, and a.kitchen. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, and Bluestone Lane. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop for fresh flowers and seasonal produce at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Beautiful One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. description:
Spacious 3 bedroom, 2.5 baths Brick Townhouse located in Perkiomen Woods Community and desirable Springford School District is available for rent. The eat-in kitchen is open to the foyer and features Granite counters and tile backsplash. Wood-look vinyl planking flooring throughout the whole first floor. Spacious Open Living room/Dining room. The living room offers a fireplace and slider to a large deck and fenced yard. The washer/dryer and powder room are all on the main level. The basement is finished with a Full bath, plenty of storage closets, and recessed lighting. The main bedroom is very large with two closets, one a walk-in! There is a slider to a private second-floor deck outside the main bedroom. 2 more freshly painted bedrooms and a shared bath complete the second floor.
The basement is finished with a Full bath, plenty of storage closets, and recessed lighting. This home is very close to the playground, pool, and tennis courts. Located 5 minutes from Rt 422 and Providence Town Center.

title: 1 Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Sauna, Near Cafes
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 414 is available for lease at this moment! This unfurnished home on the 4th floor features large windows that mainly face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view of Chancellor Street including the loading dock. One window in the bedroom area faces south and has a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
Our Rittenhouse Square apartment homes are in a prime location near everything you need and more. Within walking distance are the best restaurants in Center City, including Parc and Rouge. You will also find local shopping and entertainment nearby. Go grocery shopping at Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, and The Dr. Martens Store. Relax with a manicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a recital at the Curtis Institute of Music. Shop for flowers at the farmer's market stand right in front of the building every Saturday.
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Fitness center with a park view
* Sauna
* 8,000-square-foot Lounge 201
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Dog spa
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry room on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Renovated bathroom with white tile
* Wood floors throughout the living and dining room area
* Unfurnished 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment home on 4th floor
* Large east-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* 1 south-facing bedroom window with Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 414 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com. We welcome you to tour your new home either in person or virtually.

show contact info
About the Royal Tahitian:
"These 1,551 sq. ft. suites accommodate up to eight guests. You get all the luxuries as these units consist of the Moorea and Bora Bora units connected as one single suite. There is a king size bed in the two separate bedrooms, a sleeper sofa in the two living room areas, two showers one of which is a steam shower, a kitchenette, a fully equipped full size kitchen, and a jetted tub in the master bedroom.
No island-themed getaway would be complete without a proper pool complex and Tahiti Village has one of the most impressive in Las
Vegas. Featuring million gallons of water, a mile lazy river and a sandy beach entry, this palm tree and Palapas-surrounded oasis is the perfect spot to basque in the sun or unwind into the evening. During the summer, Tahiti Village hosts on-site luaus complete with live entertainment, specialty cocktails and traditional island fare.
In addition to our massive outdoor recreational spaces, Tahiti Village offers meeting and event spaces perfect for your next family
celebration or corporate retreat. Our dedicated concierge team can help plan your special occasion.
For those looking for a little extra pampering, our Mahana Spa provides rejuvenating treatments using exclusively Pure Fiji products containing only natural ingredients.
After a day in the sun, you're sure to work up an appetite. Tahiti Village offers two seated dining experiences on property with a Denny's and our very own 17 South Booze & Bites, a laid-back pub featuring finely crafted bar food favorites and a choice selection of beers that is inspired by the Tahitian Islands that are located 17 degrees south of the equator.
To round out the Tahiti Village experience, our Bora Bora and Royal Tahitian suites feature stackable laundry and all of our rooms are equipped with either a kitchenette or full kitchen, perfect for preparing a nourishing meal on your trip. And for guests looking to stay in shape on the go, our fully equipped fitness center is open 24 hours a day.
